invocations.description: Returns the policy of a special area.
invocations.ex:
if getareapolicy('SpecialArea1') == POLICY_TARGETING then
	setareapolicy('SpecialArea1', POLICY_ALL)
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll change the 'SpecialArea1' policy to Cavebot & Targeting' if it was only for 'Targeting'.
